item.title: Route Mobile Ltd Stock Hits All-Time Low Amid Prolonged Underperformance
item.description: Route Mobile Ltd, a player in the Telecom - Services sector, has witnessed its stock price fall to an all-time low, reflecting a sustained period of underperformance relative to market benchmarks and sector peers. The stock closed just 0.93% above its 52-week low of ₹530, marking a significant decline over recent years. Time: 3 minutes ago

item.title: HDFC Life Insurance Company Ltd Hits Intraday High with 3.02% Surge

item.title: Waaree Energies Ltd Sees Sharp Surge in Open Interest Amid Mixed Market Signals

item.title: Eternal Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Weak Price Action

item.title: Osia Hyper Retail Ltd Plunges to Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Show Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has wrapped up with 4,079 companies reporting results, revealing a nuanced landscape of corporate performance marked by modest improvement in positive earnings surprises and distinct sectoral trends. While mid-cap firms continue to outperform their large-cap counterparts in delivering positive results, the overall market sentiment remains cautious amid mixed profit growth and varied sectoral momentum. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: Jaiprakash Associates Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
